name: Garbage Cleanup Software
description:
It seems like your computer is running out of memory... There is only one way to fix this. Remove useless garbage stored on your computer!

In this game you'll play as a garbage cleanup software and remove garbage stored on the computer. This game is fully playable with a mouse and doesn't need any other components to work! Except maybe a working computer connected to the internet...

How do you remove the files? Just simply left click when your character is on top of one to remove it. But some files have special abilities and will make your life a little harder and sometimes the files will be very useful and give you special powers for a little while.

This game was made in 7 days for the blackthornprod game jam #3. https://itch.io/jam/blackthornprod-game-jam-3
